performance_metrics.name: Yield Rate
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of dough produced that ultimately converts to baked bread. Accounts for waste due to spoilage, trimming, and imperfections.

performance_metrics.name: Production Volume (Loaves/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: Number of standard loaves produced per hour. Dependent on loaf size and batch size.

performance_metrics.name: Dough Development Time (Minutes)
performance_metrics.description: Time from initial dough mixing to dough achieving optimal gluten development, crucial for texture.

performance_metrics.name: Proofing Time (Minutes)
performance_metrics.description: Time allowed for yeast fermentation, influencing final bread volume and flavor.

performance_metrics.name: Crust Color (Hunter Value)
performance_metrics.description: Measured using a Hunter Lab Colorimeter. Indicates browning level of the crust – a target range reflecting typical consumer preference.

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (Wet Basis)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of water content in the baked bread. Critical for shelf life and texture. Measured using Karl Fischer titration.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Volume (cm³/g)
performance_metrics.description: Volume of the crumb after baking.  Impacts texture and overall quality, measured using a core sampler.

performance_metrics.name: Viscosity (Pa·s)
performance_metrics.description: Measurement of dough resistance, indicative of gluten strength.  Measured using a rheometer.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Mixer Capacity
implementation_requirements.description: Capacity for bulk dough mixing, ensuring sufficient volume for large-scale production.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofer System
implementation_requirements.description: Controlled environment for proofing dough, maintaining optimal conditions for yeast activity.

implementation_requirements.name: Deck Oven System
implementation_requirements.specification: Minimum 6 Decks, Temperature Range: 350-400°F (177-204°C), Conveyor Speed: 20-30 cm/second
implementation_requirements.description: Industrial ovens for baking bread uniformly. Conveyor speed must accommodate loaf size.

implementation_requirements.name: Cooling System
implementation_requirements.specification: Rapid Cooling Tunnel: 50-60°C, Conveyor Speed: 15-20 cm/second
implementation_requirements.description: Quick cooling system to prevent over-browning and maintain moisture content.

implementation_requirements.name: Ingredient Storage
implementation_requirements.specification: Temperature: 18-24°C, Humidity: 60-70%, Separate zones for flour, yeast, and other ingredients
implementation_requirements.description: Proper storage conditions to maintain ingredient quality and shelf life.

implementation_requirements.name: CIP (Clean-In-Place) System
implementation_requirements.description: Automated system for cleaning and sanitizing equipment to prevent contamination and maintain hygiene standards.

industry_standards: HACCP (Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points)
operational_considerations: Energy Efficiency Optimization (Oven Controls, Cooling Systems)
Quality Control Procedures (Raw Material Testing, Finished Product Analysis)
Batch Size Optimization (Balancing Production Volume with Ingredient Usage)
Shelf Life Monitoring & Rotation (FIFO - First In, First Out)
